additionalProperties.description: The properties of the provisioned Event Hub-compatible endpoint used by the IoT hub.

partitionCount.description:
PartitionCount: The number of partitions for receiving device-to-cloud messages in the Event Hub-compatible endpoint.
See: https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/iot-hub/iot-hub-devguide-messaging#device-to-cloud-messages.

retentionTimeInDays.description:
RetentionTimeInDays: The retention time for device-to-cloud messages in days. See:
https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/iot-hub/iot-hub-devguide-messaging#device-to-cloud-messages

additionalProperties.description: The properties of the messaging endpoints used by this IoT hub.

maxDeliveryCount.description:
MaxDeliveryCount: The number of times the IoT hub attempts to deliver a message. See:
https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/iot-hub/iot-hub-devguide-file-upload.

ttlAsIso8601.description:
TtlAsIso8601: The period of time for which a message is available to consume before it is expired by the IoT hub. See:
https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/iot-hub/iot-hub-devguide-file-upload.

additionalProperties.description: The properties of the Azure Storage endpoint for file upload.

authenticationType.description: AuthenticationType: Specifies authentication type being used for connecting to the storage account.

connectionString.description: ConnectionString: The connection string for the Azure Storage account to which files are uploaded.

key.description: Key is the key in the Kubernetes secret being referenced

name.description:
Name is the name of the Kubernetes secret being referenced.
The secret must be in the same namespace as the resource

containerName.description:
ContainerName: The name of the root container where you upload files. The container need not exist but should be
creatable using the connectionString specified.

identity.description: Identity: Managed identity properties of storage endpoint for file upload.

sasTtlAsIso8601.description:
SasTtlAsIso8601: The period of time for which the SAS URI generated by IoT Hub for file upload is valid. See:
https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/iot-hub/iot-hub-devguide-file-upload#file-upload-notification-configuration-options.

additionalProperties.description: The properties of the provisioned Event Hub-compatible endpoint used by the IoT hub.

partitionCount.description:
PartitionCount: The number of partitions for receiving device-to-cloud messages in the Event Hub-compatible endpoint.
See: https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/iot-hub/iot-hub-devguide-messaging#device-to-cloud-messages.

partitionIds.description: PartitionIds: The partition ids in the Event Hub-compatible endpoint.

retentionTimeInDays.description:
RetentionTimeInDays: The retention time for device-to-cloud messages in days. See:
https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/iot-hub/iot-hub-devguide-messaging#device-to-cloud-messages

additionalProperties.description: The properties of the messaging endpoints used by this IoT hub.

MaxDeliveryCount: The number of times the IoT hub attempts to deliver a message. See:
https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/iot-hub/iot-hub-devguide-file-upload.

ttlAsIso8601.description:
TtlAsIso8601: The period of time for which a message is available to consume before it is expired by the IoT hub. See:
https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/iot-hub/iot-hub-devguide-file-upload.

authenticationType.description: AuthenticationType: Specifies authentication type being used for connecting to the storage account.

ContainerName: The name of the root container where you upload files. The container need not exist but should be
creatable using the connectionString specified.
